menuSystem

Class RobotSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • menuSystem.Menu
      • menuSystem.RobotSelection

  • public class RobotSelection
extends Menu
    The Code to set up the robot selection menu This menu also handles interaction with the robot librarian This class is incomplete
    Author:
    Bryton

      list of all of the robots that can be added The string is the code, which is the name of the robot The HashMap represents the HashMap returned by gson
      private boolean scoutFlag
      True if the user is setting a scout robot, false otherwise
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> scoutRobotList
      List of strings that holds all of the JSON represented data formats of each robot Segmented into three lists, one list for each class of robot
      private javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> scrollableList
      A scrollable list that represents either scoutRobotList, tankRobotList, or sniperRobotList It's displayed on the panel and allows the system user to click on it and select which robots they would like to use
      protected javax.swing.JPanel selectedRobotDisplay
      A panel that contains the information of the robot selected in the JList
      protected javax.swing.JPanel selectPanel
      A panel that contains the components that allow the user to select robots

      True if the user is setting a sniper robot, false otherwise

        The final list of robots, referencing the ones the user selected when confirm was clicked.

      • scrollableList

        private javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> scrollableList
        A scrollable list that represents either scoutRobotList, tankRobotList, or sniperRobotList It's displayed on the panel and allows the system user to click on it and select which robots they would like to use

      • getJson

        private void getJson(java.lang.String jsonString)
        method that when given a jsonString of ALL the json objects, it will parse the string and using JsonParser to create a bunch of hashmaps, then it will add each one of those hashmaps to our collection of hashmaps.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - the string at which we are creating the robot hashmpas from

      • launchGameClick

        private void launchGameClick()
        Method that is called when the launch game button is pressed. Note: The lists will be in the order of tank/scout/sniper
